task.title: Configuring CMM support for roaming - phase 2 for AMF
task.shortdesc: Step examples for configuring CMM support for roaming - phase 2 for AMF.

step.cmd: Configure a new NAS cause code mapping for access restriction.
Configure override of DNN domain derivation.
Configure equivalent PLMN sent towards GNB.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm amfSupiRangeServices modify --amfEplmnListNameGnb <string> cmm amfUePlmnServices modify --amfEplmnListNameGnb <string>

step.cmd: Configure the mapping of local home PLMN to visited PLMN NSSAI.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm hplmnToVplmnSnssaiMapping modify --hplmnToVplmnSnssaiMappingListName <string> --hsnssaiName <string> --vsnssaiName <string> --vsnssaiDefault <string> cmm hplmnToVplmnSnssaiMappingList modify --name <string> cmm amfSupiRangeServices modify --hplmnToVplmnSnssaiMappingListName <string> --mappingOfAllowedHomeNssaiQuery <list-item> cmm amfUePlmnServices modify --hplmnToVplmnSnssaiMappingListName <string> --mappingOfAllowedHomeNssaiQuery <list-item>

step.cmd: Configure N26 interworking restriction TAI list.

substep.cmd: Create AMF TAI list for N26 interworking restriction.
Add AMF TAI list to N26 interworking restriction TAI list.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm amfSupiRangeServices modify --n26IwkRestrictionTaiListName <string> cmm amfUePlmnServices modify --n26IwkRestrictionTaiListName <string>

step.cmd: Configure OAuth support for inter PLMN.
